messages.message:
Hi Team, for the multipart upload API, few details which are missing in our documentation:
1. To initiate the session for uploading the file, "path", "file_size", "batch_id", "filename" all these 4 parameters are mandatory but we have mentioned only 2 in the sample code i.e "path" ,"file_size" and 3 in the request parameter section. Can we please update all 4 in both the places? 
2. If we don't add one of these parameters, we get `400` bad request error in the response. We can add this in the response status along with other codes.

@Anshu ++ for calling this out. We already have a DOCS ticket (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/DOCS-1191) underway to improve the docs for multipart upload via API, and Iâ€™ve added your request to that ticket.
